title: What are Bill Gates' children up to? - Quora

response.answer_text: Jennifer Katharine GatesBorn April 26, 1996, Jennifer Katharine Gates is the first daughter of the world’s richest man, Bill Gates. She has an estimated net worth of around $20 Million dollar and has a hobby for horse riding. She has participated in the Winter Equestrian Festival in Florida, competing against 2,800 riders from 49 states. Her father rented a mansion nearby the festival site, spending a sum of $1million, so that his beloved daughter can participate in the festival. She has 11.6k Instagram followers. She is in Stanford class of 2018. Rory John GatesBorn May 23, 1999, Rory John Gates is Gates’ only son. Currently, he is 17 years old. Phoebe Adele GatesBorn September 14, 2002, Phoebe Adele Gates is the youngest daughter of the world’s richest man, Bill gates. She is currently 14 years old.

It is not applicable here the law 'Bill Gates' kids are Bill Gates' kids'(i don't think  richness and genetics are related) . they are also human beings having their own passion and visions.great job they are done is nothing but born as a kid of world's  richest man.First one Jennifer passionate about horse riding , but i only know there was a time she became one of the most searched names on search engines for the  simple reason that there were splashed some photos of a beautiful young  girl being claimed as the eldest daughter of the wealthiest couple in  the world.  this is the childhood photo of Jennifer with her father   second one is a boy named Rory John Gates he born in  1999 so i don't think he is now in a stage to choose his own passion  and last one girl named phoebe adele. So compared to the general proportion other kids are getting, this is a  paltry sum. In the meantime, they’re just regular kids dealing with  dad’s regular rules—even when it comes to technology. There are no  special privileges.
